name: Crypto
natural_language_description: 这是 Crypto 节点。主要用于: Provide cryptographic utilities

action.name: action
action.natural_language_description: 参数名: Action | 默认值: hash
available_options: Hash (值: hash) - Hash a text or file in a specified format
Hmac (值: hmac) - Hmac a text or file in a specified format
Sign (值: sign) - Sign a string using a private key

type.name: type
type.natural_language_description: 参数名: Type | 作用: The hash type to use | 默认值: MD5 | (必填项)

binaryData.name: binaryData
binaryData.description: Whether the data to hashed should be taken from binary field
binaryData.natural_language_description: 参数名: Binary File | 作用: Whether the data to hashed should be taken from binary field | 默认值: False | (必填项)

binaryPropertyName.name: binaryPropertyName
binaryPropertyName.description: Name of the binary property which contains the input data
binaryPropertyName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Binary Property Name | 作用: Name of the binary property which contains the input data | 默认值: data | (必填项)

value.name: value
value.description: The value that should be signed
value.natural_language_description: 参数名: Value | 作用: The value that should be signed | (必填项)

dataPropertyName.name: dataPropertyName
dataPropertyName.description: Name of the property to which to write the random string
dataPropertyName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Property Name | 作用: Name of the property to which to write the random string | 默认值: data | (必填项)

encoding.name: encoding
encoding.natural_language_description: 参数名: Encoding | 默认值: hex | (必填项)

algorithm.name: algorithm
algorithm.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
algorithm.natural_language_description: 参数名: Algorithm Name or ID | 作用: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression | (必填项)

privateKey.name: privateKey
privateKey.description: Private key to use when signing the string
privateKey.natural_language_description: 参数名: Private Key | 作用: Private key to use when signing the string | (必填项)

encodingType.name: encodingType
encodingType.description: Encoding that will be used to generate string
encodingType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Type | 作用: Encoding that will be used to generate string | 默认值: uuid | (必填项)

stringLength.name: stringLength
stringLength.natural_language_description: 参数名: Length | 作用: Length of the generated string | 默认值: 32
